page.title: 16LOCAL INDUSTRIES IN DANBURY
page.content: Mr Quilter works on an industrial estate with two other men. There they put cars together and give M.O.T. tests.Their garage is about twelve metres by ten metres.At the back of it there is a car lifter.Next door to the garage is a pallet factory it has wood delivered and it makes wood pallets.The pallets are either sold or given to the paint factory.The Paint Factory is called Flag Holesaw Paints LTD. Every day they send out two lorries of paint to D.I.Y. stores. Behind the Paint Factory is a picture framing factory who work a four day week.They supply a good range of coloured frames.It costs Â£1 to have a small picture framed,Â£2 to have a middle sized picture framed and Â£3 to have a large picture framed.
